entryLink._name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
Battle Tactics: Terror of the Undead
Regiment of Renown - The Sorrowmourne Choir
Regiment of Renown - The Summerking's Entourage
Regiment of Renown - Scions of the Necropolis
Regiment of Renown - The Liche's Hand

characteristic.__text: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Channelled Dynamism
If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly THE EXILED DEAD unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Until your next hero phase, that unit can run and still charge later in the turn.
This unit has a ward of 5+.
At the end of the battleshock phase, if a friendly THE EXILED DEAD unit is within 6” of this unit, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.
Missile
Melee
D3

Prentice Marcov is the unit champion. He is armed with a Bonesaw instead of an Arco‑electric Weapon and has a Wounds characteristic of 3. Add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls for a friendly DEINTALOS THE EXILE if this unit includes Prentice Marcov.
Regulus is armed with a Pitted Halberd instead of an Arco-electric Weapon.
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with an Arco-electric Weapon is 6, the target suffers 1 mortal wound and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound roll or save roll).
While this unit is wholly within 9” of a friendly DEINTALOS THE EXILE, Bault, Vlash, Ione and Coyl have a ward of 5+.
Melee
Melee
Melee
Pick 1 friendly SUMMONABLE unit that is more than 3" from all enemy units. You complete this battle tactic if that friendly unit is destroyed during this turn.
You complete this tactic if any wounds allocated to your general or to 2 other friendly VAMPIRE units are healed using The Hunger ability during this turn.

Pick 1 friendly SUMMONABLE unit within 3" of any enemy units. You complete this tactic if any enemy models were slain by that friendly unit this turn, and that friendly unit is within 3" of any enemy units at the end of this turn.
Pick 1 enemy HERO on the battlefield. You complete this tactic if that enemy HERO is slain during this turn by an attack made by a friendly VAMPIRE HERO.
You complete this tactic if you control 2 or more objectives wholly outside your territory and each of those objectives is contested by a friendly SUMMONABLE or VAMPIRE unit.
Pick 1 friendly SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS SUMMONABLE unit on the battlefield. You complete this tactic if 6 or more slain models are returned to that unit during this turn.

selectionEntry._name: Battle Tactics: Terror of the Undead

characteristic.__text: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Baleful Tomb Blade is 6, that attack causes 2 mortal wounds to the target in addition to any damage it inflicts.
Once per turn, this unit can issue a command to a friendly THE SONS OF VELMORN unit without a command point being spent.
At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each slain model from a friendly THE SONS OF VELMORN unit wholly within 12" of this unit. On a 4+, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.
Melee
Sir Jedran Falseborn has a Wounds characteristic of 4.
If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by this unit is 6, that attack causes 1 mortal wound to the target in addition to any damage it inflicts.

Once per turn, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that this unit will form a shieldwall. If you do so, this unit has a Save characteristic of 3+ instead of 4+ until the end of that phase. However, if you do so, this unit cannot make pile-in moves in that phase.
At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, that unit cannot make pile-in moves in that phase.
Melee
Melee
Melee
Melee

At the end of the charge phase, if this unit includes any Cursebloods, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and say that the Curseblood will unleash a gut-wrenching howl. If you do so, roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll for each Curseblood in this unit. On a 4+, the strike-last effect applies to that enemy unit in the following combat phase.

Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by enemy MONSTER that target this unit. In addition, each time an enemy MONSTER unit is destroyed by attacks made by this unit, add 3" to this unit's Move characteristic and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons for the rest of the battle.
1 model in this unit can be an Askurgan Exemplar. That model has a Wounds characteristic of 4 and is armed with Paired Askurgan Blades instead of Askurgan Weapons.
Melee
Melee
1 in every 8 models in this unit can be a Curseblood. A Curseblood has a Wounds characteristic of 4 and is armed with Elongated Claws and Slavering Maw instead of Askurgan Weapons.
Melee
Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit. In addition, if this unit has any wounds allocated to it, the Attacks characteristic if this unit's Needling Fangs is 12 instead of 2D6.

If any enemy MONSTERS are within 3" of this unit, this unit counts as 10 models for the purposes of contesting objectives.  In addition, while an enemy MONSTER is within 3" of this unit, the Attacks characteristic of that MONSTER's melee weapons is 1.
This unit is accompanied by a bat swarm armed with Needling Fangs.
Melee
Melee
Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Death's Constriction
Melee
Melee

Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that Ouboroth will use the Time-Swallower's Maw. If you do so, roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within 6" of this unit whose Move characteristic is lower than the roll suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the difference between its Move characteristic and the roll.


If the unit uses this ability, it does not benefit from the Serpentine Agility ability for the rest of the battle.
Attacks that target this unit only score a hit on an unmodified hit roll of 5 or 6.

If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. Until your next hero phase, that unit cannot pick this unit or friendly units wholly within 6" of this unit as the target of spells, prayers, abilities or shooting attacks.
Pick 1 enemy unit contesting an objective you do not control. You complete this tactic if that unit is destroyed this turn by an attack made by a friendly SUMMONABLE unit.

Pick 1 friendly SUMMONABLE unit on the battlefield that has had any models slain. You complete this tactic if any models are added to that unit this turn and the number of models in that unit is above its starting size at the end of the turn.
You complete this tactic if you complete a plot from the Demise by Design battle trait with a HERO this turn.

If this unit is included in a Soulblight Gravelords army, in your hero phase, you can pick 1 gravesite within 3" of this unit and say that it will attempt to unearth treasures. If you do so, roll a dice and look up the corresponding effect on the following table. You cannot pick the same gravesite more than once per battle.
1 Nothing but Old Bones: No effect.
2-4 Exhumed Flesh: You can return up to D3 slain models to this unit.
5-6 Buried Treasure: If a friendly ZONDARA RIVENHEART is within 3" of this unit, you can pick 1 artefact of power from the Soulblight Gravelords allegiance abilities that no HERO in your army bears for ZONDARA RIVENHEART to bear. ZONDARA RIVENHEART can bear any number of artefacts in this manner.
Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Wild Incantation

If this unit is within 3" of a friendly ZONDARA'S GRAVEBREAKERS unit, before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this unit, or instead of making a ward roll for a wound or mortal wound that would be allocated to this unit, roll a dice. On a 4+, that wound or mortal wound is allocated to that unit instead of this unit.

If successfully cast, pick a friendly DEADWALKERS unit wholly within range. Until the start of your next turn, unmodified hit rolls of 6 for attacks made by that unit automatically wound (do not make a wound roll).
